headline: Spectrum for UDP: DDoS protection and firewalling for unreliable protocols
keywords: DDoS, Spectrum, Product News, TCP, Speed & Reliability, Firewall
description: Today, we're announcing Spectrum for UDP. Spectrum for UDP works the same as Spectrum for TCP: Spectrum sits between your clients and your origin. Incoming connections are proxied through, whilst applying our DDoS protection and IP Firewall rules.
